alert.note: Alert for Southeast Tularosa Basin; West Central Tularosa Basin, White Sands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 8:27PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otero County through 900 PM MDT... At 827 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Orogrande, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Otero County. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 33 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Tularosa Basin; West Central Tularosa Basin, White Sands
